00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              RUNNING AVERAGER
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object

00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_AVERAGE_H
00012 #define TT_AVERAGE_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_average:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00028                 typedef void (tt_average::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00029                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00030                 
00031                 // Attribute Values & Variables
00032                 tt_attribute_value_discrete             interval;
00033                 tt_attribute_value_discrete             mode;
00034                 double                                                  accumulator, intervalReciprocal;
00035                 tt_sample_vector                                bins, bins_in, bins_out, bins_end;
00036         
00037                 // Constants
00038                 enum constants{
00039                         MAX_AVERAGE_INTERVAL = 256
00040                 };
00041         
00042         
00043         public:
00044                 enum selectors{                                                         
00045                         k_mode,                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00046                         k_mode_bipolar,
00047                         k_mode_absolute,
00048                         k_mode_rms,
00049                         k_interval,             
00050                 };
00051                 
00052 
00053                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00054                 tt_average()                                                            // Constructor          
00055                 {
00056                         bins = bins_in = bins_out = bins_end = 0;
00057                         bins = (tt_sample_value *)mem_alloc((1 + MAX_AVERAGE_INTERVAL) * sizeof(tt_sample_value));
00058                         set_attr(k_interval, 100);
00059                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_absolute);
00060                         clear();
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 ~tt_average()                                                           // Destructor
00064                 {
00065                         mem_free(bins);
00066                 }
00067 
00068 
00069                 // ATTRIBUTES
00070                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00071                 {
00072                         switch (sel){
00073                                 case k_interval:
00074                                         val = clip(int(val), 1, int(MAX_AVERAGE_INTERVAL));
00075                                         interval = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00076                                         clear();
00077                                         break;
00078                                 case k_mode:
00079                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00080                                         if(mode == k_mode_bipolar)
00081                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_average::dsp_vector_calc_bipolar;
00082                                         else if(mode == k_mode_absolute)
00083                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_average::dsp_vector_calc_absolute;
00084                                         else if(mode == k_mode_rms)
00085                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_average::dsp_vector_calc_rms;
00086                                         break;
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089 
00090                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00091                 {
00092                         switch (sel){
00093                                 case k_interval:
00094                                         return interval;
00095                                 case k_mode:
00096                                         return mode;
00097                                 default:
00098                                         return 0.0;
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101                 
00102                 
00103                 // clear
00104                 void clear()
00105                 {
00106                         int i;
00107                         
00108                         bins_in = bins;
00109                         for (i = 0; i < MAX_AVERAGE_INTERVAL; i++)
00110                                 *(bins_in+i) = 0.0;
00111                         
00112                         accumulator = 0.0;
00113                         intervalReciprocal = 1.0 / interval;
00114                         bins_end = bins + interval;
00115                         bins_out = bins_in - interval;
00116                         if (bins_out < bins)
00117                                 bins_out = bins_end + (bins_out - bins) + 1;
00118                 }
00119 
00120 
00121                 /*****************************************************
00122                  * DSP LOOPS
00123                  *****************************************************/
00124                 
00125                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00126                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00127                 {
00128                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in, out); // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00129                 }
00130         
00131         private:
00132                 // DSP LOOP: BIPOLAR
00133                 void dsp_vector_calc_bipolar(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00134                 {
00135                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00136                         while(temp_vs--){
00137                                 if (bins_out > bins_end)
00138                                         bins_out = bins;
00139                                 if (bins_in > bins_end)
00140                                         bins_in = bins;
00141                                 accumulator -= *bins_out++;
00142                                 
00143                                 accumulator += *bins_in++ = *in->vector++;
00144                                 *out->vector++ = accumulator * intervalReciprocal;
00145                         }
00146                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 // DSP LOOP: ABSOLUTE
00150                 void dsp_vector_calc_absolute(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00151                 {
00152                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00153                         while(temp_vs--){
00154                                 if (bins_out > bins_end)
00155                                         bins_out = bins;
00156                                 if (bins_in > bins_end)
00157                                         bins_in = bins;
00158                                 accumulator -= *bins_out++;
00159                                 
00160                                 accumulator += *bins_in++ = fabs(*in->vector++);
00161                                 *out->vector++ = accumulator * intervalReciprocal;
00162                         }
00163                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 // DSP LOOP: RMS
00167                 void dsp_vector_calc_rms(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00168                 {
00169                         tt_sample_value value;
00170                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00171                         
00172                         while(temp_vs--){
00173                                 if (bins_out > bins_end)
00174                                         bins_out = bins;
00175                                 if (bins_in > bins_end)
00176                                         bins_in = bins;
00177                                 accumulator -= *bins_out++;
00178                                 
00179                                 value = *in->vector++;
00180                                 accumulator += *bins_in++ = value * value;
00181                                 *out->vector++ = sqrt(accumulator * intervalReciprocal);
00182                         }
00183                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00184                 }
00185 };
00186 
00187 #endif  // TT_AVERAGE_H
